title: Fudge
content:
Here's a font ID request I received today, and I have drawn a blank. Anyone know this one? Something looks familiar about the d and g, but I'm not finding it. Font Fonts? (couldn't find it at T-26, which was my first impulse).   
   
Any help appreciated. ![Fudge sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124219im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28730.gif)
author: bowfinpw
